meta.name: viewport

div.h2: Free Grab 'n Go meals are available Monday through Friday at the Brownsville Middle School kitchen entrance or Fort Burd Church from 11:30 to 12:30. Friday pickup includes meals for the weekend. You MUST call 724-785-2155 extension 2507 by 9:30 a.m. each day that you need meals.

em.u: Kindergarten students for the 2020 - 2021 school year

span.span: Due to the closure of schools delaying Kindergarten Registration, we are reaching out to begin planning for the fall. We are asking all of those who intend to register a child for kindergarten for the first time in the Brownsville Area School District to complete the short form linked below.
This is not a formal registration; however, it helps us to begin the process for those children. Formal registration will tentatively take place in July 2020 -- actual date TBA.
This is for incoming KINDERGARTEN students for the 2020 - 2021 school year only. Thank you.

em.u: Pennsylvania Parent Webinar for AP changes

p.span: Here is a link to view the archived Parent Webinar about AP changes.

Our two primary goals are: 1) to preserve the safety and health of our students and staff, and 2) to keep K-12 students engaged in commensurately challenging learning activities during the extended school closure. It is a top priority of ours to ensure continuity in learning for all of our students using the best means we have available for teaching and learning exchanges.

div.p: The SAT's that were scheduled for May 2, 2020 have been cancelled.

em.u: Message from BAMS and BAHS School Counselors

span.span: The BAMS and BAHS counselors and social worker care about your needs. Please click here for more information.

em.u: Directions for Online Learning for BAMS and BAHS

span.span: Please click here for the instructions for BAMS and BAHS Online Learning. Orientation begins Friday, April 3, 2020.
If you have not received a phone call or email from us, please send us your current contact information. Call the district office (724) 785-2021 ext 3110, or email Mrs. Delgado at jdelgado@basd.org

For free student meals during the shutdown call 724-785-2155 extension 2507, by 9:30 a.m. and let the cafeteria know how many meals needed. Drive by pick up between 11:30 and 12:30 at the middle school kitchen door, located at the back of the building.
Please click here to read an important message from our BASD School Nurses.
Order your Brownsville Middle School Yearbook, with the link: www.jostens.com
